segment.source: Managing Connection Groups
segment.target: Managing Connection Groups

segment.source: Managing Connection Groups
segment.target: Managing Connection Groups

segment.source: Managing Connection Groups
segment.target: Managing Connection Groups

segment.source: Connection groups enable the applications within a package to interact with each other in the virtual environment, while remaining isolated from the rest of the system.
segment.target: Connection groups enable the applications within a package to interact with each other in the virtual environment, while remaining isolated from the rest of the system.

segment.source: By using connection groups, administrators can manage packages independently and can avoid having to add the same application multiple times to a client computer.
segment.target: By using connection groups, administrators can manage packages independently and can avoid having to add the same application multiple times to a client computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: In previous versions of App-V 5.0, connection groups were referred to as Dynamic Suite Composition.
segment.target: In previous versions of App-V 5.0, connection groups were referred to as Dynamic Suite Composition.
